item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by DC :
The stylesheet already handled multiple "see" and "definition" elements. Now the DTD allows those.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by DC :
Enabled optional top-level title and introduction. Enabled optional notes for each item.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by DC :
Initial plugin code. Thanks to Ross Gardler who contributed the code against an early version of Forrest, and to Gavin McDonald who prepared it as a new input plugin. Thanks to Ross Gardler, Gavin McDonald.
